posts.name: Kate-signal
posts.cooked:
Today, we‚Äôre releasing version 7.89 to beta. If you‚Äôre interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • Additional interface improvements, including an updated layout and Liquid Glass playback controls in the media viewer.

Backups is now available in production as well as TestFlight, but your early feedback is still crucial for us as we roll this out to a broader audience.

Please continue to report any issues you encounter!

When reporting issues, please include debug logs and screenshots if applicable; if you‚Äôre experiencing a crash, please also include .ips files. Instructions can be found here.

Thank you all, as always, for helping us improve Signal!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.88 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.89.0.1245-beta

46 new commits since 7.88.0.1237-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.89 [1]

  • Add back pressure when rotating profile key [2]

  • Enable Enhanced Security [3]

  • Enable Hardware Memory Tagging [4]

  • Use URL keyboard type for web address [5]

  • Image and string tweak for Remove Formatting [6]

  • Asyncify recent media selection logic [7]

  • Asyncify AttachmentMultisend [8]

  • Filter out past revisions of unexpected types in Backup Export [9]

  • Ensure BGProcessingTasks always cancel quickly [10]

  • Use NewKeyValueStore for a few account stores [11]

  • Support pinned message sending [12]

  • Long press actions for pinned message menu [13]

  • Avoid non-ASCII in source code [14]

  • Update bottom controls in media viewer for iOS 26. [15]

  • Remove duplicate sleep call [16]

  • 40 pt for group/profile photo in chat header on iOS 26. [17]

  • Animate banner transition for pinned messages [18]

  • Make LaunchContext less mutable, inline one property [19]

  • Fix crash when enabling Backups and not registered [20]

  • Consistently log BackupExportJob errors, remove typed throws [21]

  • Add UIScrollEdgeElementContainerInteraction to bottom toolbar in All Media. [22]

  • Update to LibSignal v0.86.7 [23]

  • Add allowSealedSenderFromAnyone to AccountSettings backup [24]

  • Kate/pin unpin fixes [25]

  • Make pinned message limit remote configable [26]

  • synced messages and info message pinned messages [27]

  • Rough-in PreviewableAttachment & SendableAttachment [28]

  • Defer SendableAttachment creation until sending [29]

  • Add better initializer for SendableAttachment [30]

  • Don‚Äôt use SignalAttachment in SendableAttachment [31]

  • Don‚Äôt use SignalAttachment type when compressing [32]

  • Require ImageQuality when sending all attachments [33]

  • More visual tweaks for All Media screen. [‚Ä¶] [34]

  • Fix installation on iOS 18 and earlier devices [35]

  • Remove DataSource protocol [36]

  • Consolidate shouldConsume logic [37]

  • Validate dataMessage.timestamp before processing [38]

  • Add & use RegisteredState [39]

  • Add banner shadows on iOS 15-18. [40]

  • Redirect the user to the in-app camera for Quick Restore scans [41]

  • Update release notes [42]

  • Update translations [43]

  • Update to Xcode 26.1.1 [44]

  • Workaround for chat view title not always accurately choosing text color. [45]

  • Update release notes [46]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.88.0.1237-beta‚Ä¶7.89.0.1245-beta

posts.name: UR
posts.cooked:
I have this exact problem in the latest stable version. Found this trying to search for a solution. I noticed it after updating to iOS 26.2.

Sharing from the photos app to signal seems to be a workaround for now

I have this issue too, also in the current stable version on the App Store and iOS 26.2. Copying screenshots into Signal also doesn‚Äôt work.

No longer an issue in App Store release 7.89 (1253).

For sticker pack selector in the new bottom toolbar in Liquid Glass style, is it possible to make the little preview icons representing each pack bigger? Ideally the same size as before, when the selector was at the top of the stickers. The way it is now, it is extremely hard on the eyes to try to make out which one of them is which.

link_counts.title: Make preview icons for sticker pack selection bigger

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.90 release

posts.cooked:
Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.91 release.
